name: Kotaku | Lifehacker | Gizmodo AU - Dark and Clean
description:
Gives Kotaku Australia, Lifehacker Australia and Gizmodo Australia an easy on the eyes and unified userstyle.

FEATURES
- Removes all those flashy ads for those without ABP (sorry to gawker)
- Removes commenting
- Removes tags and sharing options
- Compatible with Firefox and Chrome

Which leaves it straight to the most important thing, the content!
Comments/implementation requests more than welcome!

UPDATES
20/11/2010 - Initial release.
